title: Lincoln Electric Leather Welding Gloves KH641, Premium Hand Protection from Welder and Cutting Torch Heat, Commercial Quality, Cotton Lined, Gauntlet Cuff, Unisex, Grey, One Size
descriptions:
Introducing the Lincoln Electric Leather Welding Gloves KH641, the ultimate heavy-duty gloves for all your welding needs. These gloves are designed to provide maximum protection and durability, ensuring your hands are safe and comfortable during intense welding tasks.

The gloves are made with high-quality split cowhide grade A leather on the exterior, providing exceptional durability and resistance to wear and tear. The interior is lined with soft cotton fleece, offering a comfortable fit and added insulation.

With a fully welted construction and lock-stitching, these gloves are built to withstand the toughest conditions. The seams are reinforced to ensure long-lasting durability, making them perfect for heavy-duty use.

The gloves feature a gauntlet cuff style with a length of 13.5 inches, providing excellent wrist and forearm protection. This design is ideal for shielding against sparks, heat, and flames, making them suitable for MIG welding and stick welding applications.

The Lincoln Electric Leather Welding Gloves KH641 are not only protective but also highly resistant to heat, flames, and chemicals. They have been tested and proven to withstand extreme temperatures, ensuring your hands are protected in even the most hazardous environments.

The thumb design of these gloves is winged, allowing for enhanced flexibility and ease of movement. This feature enables you to have a better grip on tools and materials, enhancing your overall welding performance.

These gloves come in a stylish gray color and are designed to be unisex, making them suitable for both men and women. They are available in one size, which fits most hand sizes comfortably.

Each package contains one pair of gloves, ensuring you have a spare in case of emergencies or for sharing with a colleague. The gloves are designed to last, providing you with long-term value and peace of mind.

Upgrade your welding gear with the Lincoln Electric Leather Welding Gloves KH641. Experience superior protection, durability, and comfort during your welding projects. Order your pair today and take your welding skills to the next level.
